subelement_relations.Description: Lighting is a crucial sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It provides illumination for various activities, enhances safety and security, and enables social interactions during the evening and night.

Cooking is an essential sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It involves the preparation of meals and the provision of heat for food processing, contributing to nutrition, health, and well-being of displaced populations.

Heating is a significant sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It helps maintain thermal comfort, prevents hypothermia, and supports the well-being and health of displaced individuals in cold environments.

Cooling is an important sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It provides relief from high temperatures, reduces heat-related health risks, and improves the comfort and livability of temporary shelters.

Communication is a vital sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It enables displaced individuals to connect with their families, access information, seek assistance, and maintain social networks, contributing to their well-being and resilience.
